mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huodong_name as huodongName ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.huodong_types as huodongTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto
FROM huodong a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huodong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huodongName},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId}
and a.huodong_types = #{params.huodongTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
